card.name: CW - CCW354 - New buttons in review section for MBOD

data.text:
@lylenutt @gillianoberholzer @willemhuman @stefanbar 

Tested and from what I see on the front end, it is working.

Case 1 sent back. Case 2 placed on hold.

Image navigation seems fine. Maybe a little big of a jump when scrolling but better than the little jump it was. Ctrl 1 and 3 also work correctly.
